body_html:
From the Dockerfile that TensorFlow builds against:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.5.0/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/Dockerfile.gpu

and by tracing to the related docker images, it looks like Tensorflow 1.5.0 is built with:

CUDA_VERSION 9.0.176
CUDNN_VERSION 7.0.5.15

I think it makes sense to update the docs for CUDA/CUDNN install version.

Created a PR #16495 for version update.

and by tracing to the related docker images, it looks like Tensorflow 1.5.0 is built with:

Created a PR #16495 for version update.
body:
From the Dockerfile that TensorFlow builds against:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.5.0/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/Dockerfile.gpu

and by tracing to the related docker images, it looks like Tensorflow 1.5.0 is built with:
```
CUDA_VERSION 9.0.176
CUDNN_VERSION 7.0.5.15
```

I think it makes sense to update the docs for CUDA/CUDNN install version.

Created a PR #16495 for version update.
